description: Pi Portal v2 Config File Schema

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The AWS access key credential with write access to the bucket.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The AWS access secret key credential with write access to the bucket.

LOGZ_IO_CODE.description: A code generated by log.io, which will be injected into streamed logs to identify your account.

S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: The name of the AWS S3 bucket to upload captured videos to.

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: The token generated by Slack when you created a bot app.

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: The plain human readable name of the Slack channel where messages should be posted.

SLACK_CHANNEL_ID.description: The ID of the slack channel.  This is not the same as the name, may require using Slack in the browser to find it.

NAME.description: The name of the switch as it will appear in notifications and logs (ie. Front Door).

GPIO.description: The GPIO number this contact switch connects to.
